email.signup.body: Thank you for registering on our website. To complete the registration process, please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
email.signup.copy.text: If the button above does not work, you can copy the token below and paste it to our verification page.
email.signup.subject: Email Verification
email.signup.title: Welcome to JunoGains!
user.signup.email.error.tooRecent: Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
